# `rjd3bench`

[![R-CMD-check](https://github.com/rjdverse/rjd3bench/actions/workflows/R-CMD-check.yaml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/rjdverse/rjd3bench/actions/workflows/R-CMD-check.yaml)
[![lint](https://github.com/rjdverse/rjd3bench/actions/workflows/lint.yaml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/rjdverse/rjd3bench/actions/workflows/lint.yaml)

[![GH Pages
built](https://github.com/rjdverse/rjd3bench/actions/workflows/pkgdown.yaml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/rjdverse/rjd3bench/actions/workflows/pkgdown.yaml)

## Overview

rjd3bench provides a variety of methods for temporal disaggregation &
interpolation, benchmarking, reconciliation and calendarization.

Temporal disaggregation & interpolation:

- Chow-Lin, Fernandez and Litterman
- Model-Based Denton
- Autoregressive Distributed Lag (ADL) models
- Reverse regression

Benchmarking:

- Denton
- GRP (Growth Rate Preservation)
- Cubic Splines
- Cholette

Reconciliation and multivariate temporal disaggregation:

- Multivariate Cholette

Calendarization

## Installation

Running rjd3 packages requires **Java 17 or higher**. How to set up such
a configuration in R is explained
[here](https://jdemetra-new-documentation.netlify.app/#Rconfig)

### Latest release

To get the current stable version (from the latest release):

- From GitHub:

``` r
# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("rjdverse/rjd3toolkit@*release")
remotes::install_github("rjdverse/rjd3bench@*release", build_vignettes = TRUE)
```

- From [r-universe](https://rjdverse.r-universe.dev/rjd3bench):

``` r
install.packages("rjd3bench", repos = c("https://rjdverse.r-universe.dev", "https://cloud.r-project.org"))
```

### Development version

To get the current development version from GitHub:

``` r
# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("rjdverse/rjd3bench", build_vignettes = TRUE)
```

## Package Maintenance and contributing

Any contribution is welcome and should be done through pull requests
and/or issues. pull requests should include **updated tests** and
**updated documentation**. If functionality is changed, docstrings
should be added or updated.

## Licensing

The code of this project is licensed under the [European Union Public
Licence
(EUPL)](https://interoperable-europe.ec.europa.eu:443/collection/eupl/eupl-text-eupl-12).

# Package index

## All functions

- [`adl_disaggregation()`](https://rjdverse.github.io/rjd3bench/reference/adl_disaggregation.md)
  : Temporal disaggregation of a time series with ADL models
- [`calendarization()`](https://rjdverse.github.io/rjd3bench/reference/calendarization.md)
  : Calendarization
- [`cholette()`](https://rjdverse.github.io/rjd3bench/reference/cholette.md)
  : Benchmarking by means of the Cholette method
- [`cubicspline()`](https://rjdverse.github.io/rjd3bench/reference/cubicspline.md)
  : Benchmarking by means of cubic splines
- [`denton()`](https://rjdverse.github.io/rjd3bench/reference/denton.md)
  : Benchmarking by means of the Denton method.
- [`denton_modelbased()`](https://rjdverse.github.io/rjd3bench/reference/denton_modelbased.md)
  : Temporal disaggregation & interpolation of a time series by
  model-based Denton proportional method
- [`denton_raw()`](https://rjdverse.github.io/rjd3bench/reference/denton_raw.md)
  : Benchmarking of an atypical frequency series by means of the Denton
  method.
- [`temporaldisaggregation()`](https://rjdverse.github.io/rjd3bench/reference/deprecated-rjd3bench.md)
  : Deprecated functions
- [`grp()`](https://rjdverse.github.io/rjd3bench/reference/grp.md) :
  Benchmarking following the growth rate preservation principle.
- [`multivariatecholette()`](https://rjdverse.github.io/rjd3bench/reference/multivariatecholette.md)
  : Reconciliation by means of the Multivariate Cholette method
- [`plot(`*`<JD3AdlDisagg>`*`)`](https://rjdverse.github.io/rjd3bench/reference/plot.JD3AdlDisagg.md)
  : Plot function for object of class JD3AdlDisagg
- [`plot(`*`<JD3Interpolation>`*`)`](https://rjdverse.github.io/rjd3bench/reference/plot.JD3Interpolation.md)
  : Plot function for object of class JD3Interpolation
- [`plot(`*`<JD3MBDenton>`*`)`](https://rjdverse.github.io/rjd3bench/reference/plot.JD3MBDenton.md)
  : Plot function for object of class JD3MBDenton
- [`plot(`*`<JD3TempDisagg>`*`)`](https://rjdverse.github.io/rjd3bench/reference/plot.JD3TempDisagg.md)
  : Plot function for object of class JD3TempDisagg
- [`plot(`*`<JD3TempDisaggI>`*`)`](https://rjdverse.github.io/rjd3bench/reference/plot.JD3TempDisaggI.md)
  : Plot function for object of class JD3TempDisaggI
- [`print(`*`<JD3AdlDisagg>`*`)`](https://rjdverse.github.io/rjd3bench/reference/print.JD3AdlDisagg.md)
  : Print function for object of class JD3AdlDisagg
- [`print(`*`<JD3Interpolation>`*`)`](https://rjdverse.github.io/rjd3bench/reference/print.JD3Interpolation.md)
  : Print function for object of class JD3Interpolation
- [`print(`*`<JD3InterpolationRaw>`*`)`](https://rjdverse.github.io/rjd3bench/reference/print.JD3InterpolationRaw.md)
  : Print function for object of class JD3InterpolationRaw
- [`print(`*`<JD3MBDenton>`*`)`](https://rjdverse.github.io/rjd3bench/reference/print.JD3MBDenton.md)
  : Print function for object of class JD3MBDenton
- [`print(`*`<JD3TempDisagg>`*`)`](https://rjdverse.github.io/rjd3bench/reference/print.JD3TempDisagg.md)
  : Print function for object of class JD3TempDisagg
- [`print(`*`<JD3TempDisaggI>`*`)`](https://rjdverse.github.io/rjd3bench/reference/print.JD3TempDisaggI.md)
  : Print function for object of class JD3TempDisaggI
- [`print(`*`<JD3TempDisaggRaw>`*`)`](https://rjdverse.github.io/rjd3bench/reference/print.JD3TempDisaggRaw.md)
  : Print function for object of class JD3TempDisaggRaw
- [`qna_data`](https://rjdverse.github.io/rjd3bench/reference/qna_data.md)
  : Quarterly National Accounts data for temporal disaggregation
- [`summary(`*`<JD3AdlDisagg>`*`)`](https://rjdverse.github.io/rjd3bench/reference/summary.JD3AdlDisagg.md)
  : Summary function for object of class JD3AdlDisagg
- [`summary(`*`<JD3Interpolation>`*`)`](https://rjdverse.github.io/rjd3bench/reference/summary.JD3Interpolation.md)
  : Summary function for object of class JD3Interpolation
- [`summary(`*`<JD3InterpolationRaw>`*`)`](https://rjdverse.github.io/rjd3bench/reference/summary.JD3InterpolationRaw.md)
  : Summary function for object of class JD3InterpolationRaw
- [`summary(`*`<JD3MBDenton>`*`)`](https://rjdverse.github.io/rjd3bench/reference/summary.JD3MBDenton.md)
  : Summary function for object of class JD3MBDenton
- [`summary(`*`<JD3TempDisagg>`*`)`](https://rjdverse.github.io/rjd3bench/reference/summary.JD3TempDisagg.md)
  : Summary function for object of class JD3TempDisagg
- [`summary(`*`<JD3TempDisaggI>`*`)`](https://rjdverse.github.io/rjd3bench/reference/summary.JD3TempDisaggI.md)
  : Summary function for object of class JD3TempDisaggI
- [`summary(`*`<JD3TempDisaggRaw>`*`)`](https://rjdverse.github.io/rjd3bench/reference/summary.JD3TempDisaggRaw.md)
  : Summary function for object of class JD3TempDisaggRaw
- [`temporal_disaggregation()`](https://rjdverse.github.io/rjd3bench/reference/temporal_disaggregation.md)
  : Temporal disaggregation of a time series by regression models.
- [`temporal_disaggregation_raw()`](https://rjdverse.github.io/rjd3bench/reference/temporal_disaggregation_raw.md)
  : Temporal disaggregation of an atypical frequency series by
  regression models.
- [`temporal_interpolation()`](https://rjdverse.github.io/rjd3bench/reference/temporal_interpolation.md)
  : Interpolation of a time series by regression models.
- [`temporal_interpolation_raw()`](https://rjdverse.github.io/rjd3bench/reference/temporal_interpolation_raw.md)
  : Interpolation of an atypical frequency series by regression models.
- [`temporaldisaggregationI()`](https://rjdverse.github.io/rjd3bench/reference/temporaldisaggregationI.md)
  : Temporal disaggregation of a time series by means of a reverse
  regression model.

### All vignettes

- [Temporal disaggregation and Benchmarking methods based on JDemetra+
  v3.x](https://rjdverse.github.io/rjd3bench/articles/rjd3bench.md):
